ygData.subject: Watchful eyes
ygData.msgSnippet: The four robots near the Predacon territory. The three humanoid ones begin to speak in complete unison Unit Reflector and Ratbat returning they anounce. At

Subject: Watchful eyes
References: <3B0A20AD.19962.200E4CD@localhost>
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

The four robots near the Predacon territory. The three humanoid ones
begin to speak in complete unison "Unit Reflector and Ratbat returning"
they anounce. At that a large building emerges from underground and
opens up. The four fly into it. Reflector's parts land, and Ratbat
perches on the middle ones shoulder. Then lights begin to iluminate, and
a small table is visible, with three ancient robots surrounding it. "Was
your mission a success?" One of the old forms says, not wasting any
time. Reflector nods, then the three parts transform into a camera
again, hooking up to a machine on the wall. Ratbat then transforms into
a cassette and enters the Machine. The scren begins to illuminate with
pictures of the meeting that had just happened between the Autobots,
then slowly sound is added. The three robots look on with interest.
